div.p: Future values represent averages across three general circulation models: CanESM2 (Can), CCSM4 (CCSM), and GFDL-CM3 (GFDL), and are presented for two IPCC greenhouse gas concentration scenarios: RCP 4.5 and RCP 8.5. Error bars represent 1 SE.
